entry.title: Here Is Today’s 'Major' Telegram Game Puzzle Durov Combo
entry.summary: Looking to complete Major’s daily Pavel Durov puzzle on Telegram? Here’s the solution updated on Monday, October 21.

entry.title: Ripple Labs Founder Donates Another $10 Million in XRP to Support Kamala Harris
entry.summary: Ripple co-founder Chris Larsen said that he has donated another $10 million in XRP to help boost Kamala Harris in the U.S. election.

entry.title: Coinbase Will 'Not Relent' in Push to Uncover Motives Behind US Crypto Crackdown
entry.summary: Crypto exchange Coinbase is seeking documents from the FDIC over whether the bank regulator privately prohibited depository institutions from holding digital assets.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETF Options Could Boost Action on Wall Street—And Volatility, Say Analysts
entry.summary: With the SEC's approval of options for spot Bitcoin ETFs, analysts expect another wave of institutional adoption and associated volatility.

entry.title: 'Blade Runner 2049' Studio Sues Elon Musk for Copyright Infringement Over AI Images
entry.summary: Attorneys for Alcon Entertainment said the company did not want to be associated with Musk’s capricious behavior, “which veers into hate speech.”

entry.title: Fed President Says Crypto 'Almost Never' Used Outside of Drug Deals, Illegal Activities
entry.summary: Minneapolis Federal Reserve President Neel Kashkari said “very few transactions are actually happening” in crypto at a town hall in Wisconsin.

entry.title: ‘America Loves Crypto’? The Black Keys Will Play Ohio Concert Amid Contentious Senate Race
entry.summary: “Pretty liberal” rock duo The Black Keys will play a Coinbase-backed event in Ohio, as a PAC backed by the exchange aims to elect a hardline conservative to Senate in the battleground state.

entry.title: 'I Just Like Dogecoin': Elon Musk Pumps Meme Coin to 4-Month High
entry.summary: Elon Musk insists that he's not "actively involved" in crypto, but his recent Dogecoin mentions appear to be pumping the meme coin's price.

entry.title: New AI Model Developed by Harvard Detects Cancer With 96% Accuracy
entry.summary: Developed by Harvard Medical School, CHIEF was trained on 44 terabytes of data, to make it extremely good at detecting tumors and providing insights for healthcare professionals.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETFs Add Billions of Dollars Amid Rising Trump Optimism: CoinShares
entry.summary: Investors are feeling bullish about Bitcoin again, with over $2 billion flowing into ETFs last week as BTC flirted with $70,000.

entry.title: Pump.fun Teases Token and 'Lucrative' Solana Airdrop Amid Record Week
entry.summary: Solana meme coin factory Pump.fun launched a new trading bot—and revealed that it will launch a token with a likely airdrop attached.

entry.title: Bitcoin Price Dips After Failing to Hit $70,000, Leaving Longs Rekt
entry.summary: Bitcoin's close call with $70,000 may have boosted trader optimism, leaving a trail of liquidations as the price fell below $67,000 Monday.

entry.title: VanEck Adds Staking Rewards to Solana Investment Product in Europe
entry.summary: As VanEck’s Solana ETN begins offering investors passive income in the EU, the asset manager awaits input on an application in the U.S.

entry.title: Tether-Owned Northern Data Considering Sale of Bitcoin Mining Firm Peak
entry.summary: Northern Data Group has plans to acquire data centers and AI-centric GPUs with funds raised from the potential sale of its Bitcoin mining business.

entry.title: Here Is Today’s 'Captain Tsubasa: Rivals' Telegram Game Daily Combo
entry.summary: Anime soccer game Captain Tsubasa: Rivals gives out 5 million free daily balls ahead of the TON token airdrop. Here’s the combo for Monday, October 21.

entry.summary: Telegram game Tomarket is handing out free tomatoes and bonus items ahead of the airdrop. Here’s the combo for Monday, October 21.

entry.title: Why Bitcoin ETF Options Will Supercharge the Trump Trade, According to QCP
entry.summary: Bitcoin ETF options will give Bitcoin ETFs "the needed liquidity to attract sustainable inflows,” QCP Capital wrote.

entry.title: ApeCoin Doubles in Price as ApeChain Launches With Pump.fun Clone, 'Top Trader' Game
entry.summary: Ethereum layer-2 network ApeChain launched on Sunday with a variety of games and apps, leading ApeCoin to spike by over 100%.

entry.title: Stripe Inks $1.1 Billion Deal to Buy Stablecoin Platform Bridge
entry.summary: The deal, one of the largest in crypto history, follows Stripe announcing stablecoin support earlier this month.

entry.title: Vitalik Buterin: ‘The Scourge’ to Address Ethereum's Proof-of-Stake Centralization Risks
entry.summary: The Ethereum co-founder warned that economic pressures could allow large stakers to dominate the network, in a new blog post.

entry.title: WazirX Moved $75M to Global Exchanges After Hack: CoinSwitch Co-Founder
entry.summary: CoinSwitch has released a dashboard tracking the movement of funds from WazirX’s recently disclosed wallets.

entry.title: Nicolas Cage Warns Actors That AI 'Wants to Take Your Instrument'
entry.summary: The “Longlegs” star told actors at the Newport Beach Film Festival that AI can be used to “change your performance.”

entry.title: Bitcoin Bulls Are Targeting $72,000, Say Analysts
entry.summary: The Bitcoin price briefly touched a high of $69,227 earlier today, during European trading hours.

entry.summary: Catch up on this week’s biggest crypto and NFT gaming news and find some weekend reads in our latest roundup.

entry.title: 5 Big Upgrades That 'Off the Grid' Needs Before Leaving Early Access
entry.summary: Avalanche-based battle royale shooter Off the Grid made a big splash, but a few key tweaks and additions are needed for the full rollout.

entry.title: Why 'X Empire' Telegram Players Are Complaining to Elon Musk About the Airdrop
entry.summary: Only a fraction of X Empire players are getting tokens—and they’re telling Elon Musk, who has nothing to do with the Telegram game.

entry.title: Kamala Harris Crypto Regulation Plans Spark Criticism—But Also Optimism
entry.summary: The Kamala Harris campaign’s focus on Black male crypto investors sparks claims of pandering, but some still consider it a positive move.

entry.summary: Looking for some great games to play on your Xbox Series X/S without paying a dime? Here are our favorite Xbox freebies right now.

entry.summary: Bored Ape Yacht Club game Dookey Dash: Unclogged serves up an endless runner with real prizes. Here's how to rule the sewers.

entry.title: Bluesky Signups Surge After Elon Musk's Twitter Says AI Can Be Trained on Tweets
entry.summary: Elon Musk's controversial moves at Twitter have sparked another user exodus, fueling explosive growth for decentralized rival Bluesky.

entry.title: No, the SEC Isn't Backing Off Solana—Here's the Latest
entry.summary: New developments in the SEC’s lawsuit against Binance indicate the regulator is ratcheting up its case against SOL and other crypto tokens—not backing down, as some had hoped.

entry.title: Huge week for BTC ETFs, Crypto now through Venmo, Memes Dominate Gainers
entry.summary: BTC ETFs see biggest inflow week since July. BlackRock ETF sees $1bn inflows in a week. Venmo can now be used to buy crypto on Moonpay. SEC’s XRP appeal doesn’t challenge security status. Worldcoin rebrands to World with new orb. EigenLayer X account compromised. FBI arrests hacker of SEC X account. SCB in Thailand adopts stablecoins for transfers. DBS in Singapore adopts ‘token services’. Trump family to get 75% of WLFL revenue. Scroll team accused of owning sybil addresses. STX Nakamoto upgrade to happen next week.

entry.title: Olympic Snowboarder Used Tether in Cocaine-Smuggling Murder Scheme, Feds Say
entry.summary: A Canadian Olympic snowboarder and his gang used Tether (USDT) as part of its cocaine trafficking operation, U.S. authorities allege.

entry.title: Bitcoin 'Trump Trade' Returns as BlackRock's ETF Brings in Another $1 Billion
entry.summary: Bitcoin ETF inflows have accelerated this week as the 2024 presidential election tightens in its final weeks.

entry.title: Will 'Off the Grid' Take Crypto Games Mainstream?
entry.summary: Avalanche shooter Off the Grid has already made a huge splash in early access. We discuss the launch and potential impact on gaming.

entry.title: Majors Fall 1 to 2%, A New Tiger takes to the Charts, Van Eck teases Big Web3 Gaming
entry.summary: A lucky GOAT memecoin trader turned $5,000 into $1.5M during GOAT's run to $300M. A new memecoin based on Disney Park's new baby tiger "Bakso" was a top mover on Wednesday, running to $10M (now $6M). Crypto majors fall 1-2%, memes red across board. a16z calls 2024 crypto's biggest year yet in "State of Crypto" report. Vitalik publishes part 2 of blog outlining ETH's future. Van Eck teases big bet on Parallel and web3 gaming. Huge day for digital art with 4 marquee mints seeing success.

entry.title: Hamster Kombat Season 2 Teaser
entry.summary: Here's a first look at Season 2 of Telegram tap-to-earn game Hamster Kombat.

entry.title: BTC hits $68K, Trump odds Continue to Rise, GOAT nears $300M
entry.summary: BTC hits $68k as ETF inflows continue to soar. Open Interest at CME hits ATH, funding still low. Tesla moves $750m BTC to new wallet. Canary applies for Litcoin ETF, LTC up 8%. Grayscale asks SEC to convert altcoin fund to ETF. Kraken integrates with EigenLayer for restaking. ‘Network state’ Praxis raises $525m for new city. Trump project raises only $11m so far. a16z founders donate $2.5m to Trump PAC. TikTok accused of being crypto exchange in UK. Gotbit CEO arrested in Portugal. Perplexity AI launches finance platform.

entry.title: ETF Inflows Soar, Kamala Courts Crypto, TURBO Nears $1BN!
entry.summary: ETFs see $800m inflows in 2-days, huge volume. ETF inflows may be linked to Trump odds: CoinShares. Bitcoin will rival housing market as asset class: Fink. Vitalik proposes drop to 1ETH to become validator. Kamala reveals pro-crypto policies. Kamala mocked for linking crypto to race. Hyperliquid announces HYPE token coming. PUFFER airdrop claim goes live. Tether considering lending to commodities trader. Man takes $500m lost Bitcoin case to court. Google removes crypto prices from search. SUI Foundation denies $400m insider selling. UAE approves $AED stablecoin. Bitget wallet now only behind Binance for downloads.

entry.title: BTC hits 2-week High, China Stocks Rally again, GOAT hits $120M
entry.summary: BTC hits 2-week high as China stocks rise. SUI breaks into the top 15 coins. $1.3bn ETH might be sold from PlusToken scam. S. Korea may approve BTC & ETH ETFs this month. Australia launches first ETH ETF. Samara to buy BTC with $33m bond. Altcoins to see $500m unlocks this week. Vitalik writes blog on the future of ETH. Grayscale reveals 35 altcoins considered for funds. Ethena proposes SOL for USDe collateral. Only one Binance launchpad coin up this year. AVAX summit begins this week.

entry.title: Todd ‘revealed’ as Satoshi, Google may be Broken-up, Murad’s Wallets Doxxed
entry.summary: BTC will be range bound until election: Bernstein. TAO & memecoins dominate mindshare. Peter Todd ‘revealed’ as Satoshi by HBO. US government able to sell $4.4bn Silk Road BTC. Ireland unable to access $378m seized BTC. SOL could do 5x if Trump wins: StanChart. Coinbase integrates Taproot addresses for BTC. Canary Capital applies for XRP ETF. S. Korea to regulate stablecoin transfers. CryptoCom files countersuit against SEC. Babylon fills cap with 22k BTC. Scroll airdrop coming Oct 22nd. USDC goes live on SUI.

entry.title: Crypto Falls Ahead of CPI, Stripe Reinstates Crypto, Fed Charges Market-makers
entry.summary: Majors drop despite stocks hitting ATHs. Stripe reinstates crypto payments. Crypto settlements near $20bn in 2024. S. Korea to review ban on BTC ETFs. US charges market makers for market manipulation. FBI created their own coin to ensnare targets. Vitalik ‘outside pick’ for Nobel Prize. Trump family token to built on Aave stack. $16m OP tokens allocated to superchain users. Wisdomtree debuts debit card for on-chain fund. 47% of hedge funds have crypto exposure. Argentina overtakes Brazil for crypto inflows. Tucker interviews Ryan Salame over FTX.

entry.title: Bitcoin Bounces from $59K, Tesla unveils Robotaxis, Memecoins Outperform
entry.summary: BTC briefly dips under $59k, $160m liquidations. Mt Gox extends repayment plan by 1 year. Uniswap plans L2 for DeFi. SEC sues crypto trading firm Cumberland. Binomial sues SEC over futures trading. SEC’s Uyeda criticises agency’s policy. Justin Sun named prime minister of Liberland. MicroStrategy wants to become BTC bank. Binance pre-market trading goes live. Nearly 50% of US investors want crypto ETFs. Whale phished for $35m crypto. Ethena invests $46m in RWA funds. Trump’s crypto project aims to raise $300m.

entry.title: Decentraland Desktop Client Preview
entry.summary: Ethereum metaverse game Decentraland has shared an exclusive look at the visual and performance upgrades coming via its new desktop client.

entry.title: Crypto Trader Murad Mahmudov talks about the Supercycle and how he chooses Meme Coins.
entry.summary: Crypto Trader Murad Mahmudov talks about the Supercycle and how he chooses Meme Coins. Crypto stable, had sold off after China stocks fall. Crypto adopted faster than other tech: BlackRock. Crypto adoption to hit 8% of world population. CryptoCom recieves Wells notice from SEC. HBO documentary on Satoshi airs tonight. FTX bankruptcy plan approved by judge. Scroll airdrop may be imminent. Jupiter goes live on mobile iOS. Phantom rolls out support for Base. AAVE launches GHO on Base. Gensler may be replaced by Robinhood CLO. 87% of new token launches on SOL. National Bank of Bahrain creates BTC fund. BedRock DeFi allows BTC staking on ARB.

entry.title: Memecoins take off, funding stays low, China stocks keep on rising!
entry.summary: FOMO HOUR EP213. Memecoins take off, funding stays low, China stocks keep on rising! Many altcoins & memecoins soar despite stable BTC. Funding rates continue to be low or negative. Crypto funds saw $147m of outflows last week. BTC remains best performing major assets this year. SUI breaks into the top 20 coins again. TAO leads top 100 away from memes, sifu shorts. $100m bridge to SOL over the last 7 days. Metaplanet buys $6.7m more BTC. ETH proposal aims to improve throughput 50%. EIGEN, OP, APT lead token unlocks this week.

entry.title: How Walrus Protocol Unlocks New Applications for Decentralized Data Storage
entry.summary: Mysten Labs Chief Scientist George Danezis joined Decrypt to talk about its new decentralized storage protocol Walrus, which promises to unlock new applications such as AI and social media, thanks to its novel Red Stuff data encoding algorithm.

entry.title: Why Coinbase Sees Crypto as a Bipartisan, 'Purple' Political Issue
entry.summary: Coinbase VP of Corporate and Business Development, Shan Aggarwal, joined Decrypt's Sander Lutz and Liz Napolitano at Messari Mainnet 2024 to discuss the exchange's efforts to grow mainstream crypto adoption—and how the changing political conversation around digital assets is rapidly playing a major role in that.

entry.title: Binance Is Playing Offense—Not Just Defense—Against Crypto Crime, Says Head of Financial Investigations
entry.summary: Nils Anderson Röed, the exchange’s global head of financial investigations, sat down with Decrypt’s Sander Lutz at Messari Mainnet 2024 to discuss how Binance is proactively dismantling criminal networks around the world, the strategy with which the crypto exchange is approaching sensitive conflicts in the Middle East, and more.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 212 - SEEDPHRASE TALKS ART!
entry.summary: Payrolls Higher than expected, Bitcoin reacts hard. Crypto sank early in the week as Middle East tensions spooked markets. Powell signals two more rate cuts this year. SUI leads L1s again, nears YTD high despite large unlock. Majority of FTX repayments still months away. EIGEN becomes non-transferable, hits $6bn FDV. SEC to appeal Ripple securities law ruling. Visa launches tokenization platform for banks. SWIFT plans digital asset trial in 2025. ByBit launched trading of global stock indices. SPX, GIGA & FWOG hit ATHs, most memes fall. XCOPY to release 250 piece collection on Shape. HBO documentary claims to have identified Satoshi.

entry.title: Altcoins bleed, ByBit launches stock index trading, POCHITA soars
entry.summary: Altcoins sink, BTC dominance nears cycle high. BTC in ‘three blind mice’ downtrend. Tron revenue hits record $577m in Q3. ByBit to launch trading of major stock indices. Franklin Templeton launch fund on APT. SWIFT banks to trial digital assets in 2025. Aerodrome hits $1bn TVL on Base. Cronje calls out Aerodrome for copyright. ETH ICO wallet sells $47m. SEC files appeal against Ripple ruling. EIGEN falls 20% on staking rewards FUD. FTX to auction off WLD position. Half of US voters think crypto ‘important’. North Korea ‘infiltrating’ crypto industry. Snowden challenged over SOL centralisation view. Top SEC official on crypto set to depart.

entry.title: DACOM Summit: Fastex CLO Vardan Khachatryan on Crypto Compliance
entry.summary: Fastex Chief Legal Officer Vardan Khachatryan joined Rug Radio creator Mlow at DACOM Summit to discuss how the crypto exchange is advancing compliance, and the regulatory challenges that lie ahead for the sector.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 210 - MIDDLE EAST TENSIONS RISE
entry.summary: Crypto drops as Middle East tensions flare. $500m liquidations in drop. BTC ETFs see largest outflows in a month. Fidelity ETH ETF sees 2nd highest outflow ever. SUI hits 6-month highs, bridge goes live on mainnet. Hashdex set to launch XRP ETF. Wormhole leads altcoin gains after Upbit lists. BTC miners hit record low profits in September Crypto hackers stole $750m in Q3. Telegram has been disclosing IPs since 2018.

entry.title: How Arbitrum is Simplifying Web3 for Web2 Adopters
entry.summary: Arbitrum's Head of Korea, John Park, joined Rug Radio creator Pukerainbow at ArbiVerse to talk about the Ethereum layer-2's strategy in Asia, hackathons, and bringing enterprise clients to its ecosystem.
